column1: Overhill was a small village in the Westfarthing
column2: to the north of Hobbiton and Hobbiton Hill
column3: marking the end of the short road that ran past Bag End and Bagshot Row. Though the Boffin Family was generally associated with The Yale in the Eastfarthing of the Shire
column4: there was at least one Boffin who lived in Overhill: an apparently well-to-do Hobbits who employed Samwise Gamgee cousin Halfast Gamgee.

column1: On the original map of the Shire

column2: towns and villages of the Shire
